description: A file entity contains information about a data file produced from any process.

checksum.description: MD5 checksum of the data file.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

file_format.description: The format of the data file.

file_name.description: The filename of the data file.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

title: file_core
